greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: n^(n+1) mod n+2.
comment: First occurrence of n such that n^(n+1) (modulo n+2) == k for k = 1, 2, 3, ..., or 0 if no such n is known: 1, 20735, 10667, 4, 0, 3761, 3820819, 8, 33, 40, 350849481, 12, 25, ..., .
link: Carl R. White, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
formula: a(n-2) = A062173(n) if n is odd or n is power of two, and a(n-2) = n - A062173(n) otherwise. - _Thomas Ordowski_, Nov 28 2013
results.author: _Zak Seidov_, Jul 14 2005
